examples.example: 他总是大声地表达自己的观点，充满了自信和热情。

translate.english: He always expresses his opinions loudly, full of confidence and enthusiasm.

examples.example: 他站在山顶大声呼喊，释放着内心的喜悦。

translate.english: He stood on the top of the mountain and shouted loudly, releasing the joy in his heart.

examples.example: 孩子们在公园里大声欢笑，享受着美好的时光。

translate.english: The children laugh loudly in the park and enjoy the wonderful time.
